TopicTitle: RO - Saab's Misc. RO Parts - Progress

Articles.Content:
Greetings,

This is going to be the spot where I deposit the random RO based parts I am working on...

**Current Projects: RFTS, Realistic Parts for "Stock"**

**Backburner: LR-87/91**

The latest:

![eBgkug3.png](http://i.imgur.com/eBgkug3.png)

![HDYynpN.png](http://i.imgur.com/HDYynpN.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-26T16:33:35Z" title="12/26/2015 04:33  PM" data-short="8 yr">December 26, 2015</time> by saabstory88**
  
updates!

**Awesome!!** ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Btw, sorry about the delay on your CMES pull--I don't feel qualified to review it myself, so it's waiting on Felger having time...

> 
> **Awesome!!** ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> Btw, sorry about the delay on your CMES pull--I don't feel qualified to review it myself, so it's waiting on Felger having time...

No problem. Its incomplete and a work in progress. Definitely need feedback and help patching over the current CMES mm configs. This project is really what I want to work on. Realism Overhaul deserves to be complete!

This is awesome! A while back, I attempted to start learning how to 3D model and create parts for KSP by attempting my own Thor for exactly the purpose you described. Unfortunately, it turned out horribly and school got in the way, so I couldn't continue, but I'm so glad that someone has finally started this. Props to you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> This is awesome! A while back, I attempted to start learning how to 3D model and create parts for KSP by attempting my own Thor for exactly the purpose you described. Unfortunately, it turned out horribly and school got in the way, so I couldn't continue, but I'm so glad that someone has finally started this. Props to you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

We'll see. I come from a land of architectural drafting. Unfortunately, drafting programs don't pay attention to normals and clean quads! I'll try my best ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Texture Rework, added Centaur G, G Prime. UV issues, but oh well... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Looks good so far! I've got a suggestion, or side note: I could make the Atlas I -III main tanks, I will do those anyway for launchers pack, so you could use them here too. Are you interested? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Looks good so far! I've got a suggestion, or side note: I could make the Atlas I -III main tanks, I will do those anyway for launchers pack, so you could use them here too. Are you interested? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

If you're taking on the Atlas tanks then great! I'm not looking for duplication, just trying to fill in the gaps in the historical launchers. Basically, because FASA still contains composite parts and Kerbalized textures, this is more of an expansion pack for RO rather than something in its own right. For example, there's no need for a better RL-10 model, as FASA's model is great, so all that will be provided here are the Centaur tanks which haven't been addressed thus far in RO. That being said, at least for the Titan, I think that it's going to need its own set of engines because of FASA's tank butts. It'll give me chance to see if I'm clever enough to make the LR-91 turbopump thrust vectoring a thing ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

But yeah, by all means, go for it, I'll strike it from the list! Woo-hoo, history!

Haha ok great, I will let you know how I am progressing! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Though I can't say when I will have the tanks ready, I've got some other projects currently going on too... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
(scrubscribing)
